public class EcmaScriptParseException

Exception used to signal parsing errors

Method Summary
 int getLineNumber()
          Get the line number of the error if possible
 java.lang.String getMessage()
           
 boolean isIncomplete()
          return true if incomplete parse (maybe the user is given a chance to complete it)
 void setNeverIncomplete()
          Indicate that this cannot be a recoverable incomplete error because, for example, the evaluation source is a string passed as a parameter to eval, not a stream read from an user.

isIncomplete

public boolean isIncomplete()
return true if incomplete parse (maybe the user is given a chance to complete it)
Overrides:

setNeverIncomplete

public void setNeverIncomplete()
Indicate that this cannot be a recoverable incomplete error because, for example, the evaluation source is a string passed as a parameter to eval, not a stream read from an user.
